column2: දෛනික තත්තත්තව වාර්තාව-ශ්‍රී ලංකාව/epiyik mwpf;if-,yq;if/Special Situation Report- Sri Lanka දිනය/jpfjp /Date : 19th March 2023 at 1800hrs

column6: There is risk of further rock falling in Kandy-Mahiyanganaya road. Hence Kandy Mahiyangana road will
be close at 2nd bend Ududumbara from 1800hrs today. Traffic is being diverted through other roads.
